text: Blaž Vrhovnik (born 8 May 1981) is a Slovenian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Slovenia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ljubljana
title: Blaž Vrhovnik
